info.sjis: 召喚獣トロッコに乗車の際には 足下に十分ご注意下さい
info.ascii: Please watch your step boarding the rail car.

portrait_l.name: child
portrait_l.sjis: 村の外には、はぐれが いっぱいいるから 出ちゃいけないんだよ
portrait_l.ascii: There's a lot of Strays outside the village. It's not safe to leave.

portrait_l.name: child
portrait_l.sjis: でも、いつか旅立つ日が来るのよ
portrait_l.ascii: But someday, I'll go on a journey.
